```{r}
combining_all <- function(datasets, meta_datasets) {
  
  data <- data.frame()
  meta <- data.frame()
  
  if (missing(datasets) == FALSE){
    ds_list <- mget(datasets)
    
    for (i in ds_list) {
      data <- plyr::rbind.fill(ds_list[i], data)
    }
  }
  
  if (missing(meta_datasets) == FALSE) {
    meta_list <- mget(meta_datasets)
    for (i in meta_list) {
      meta <- plyr::rbind.fill(meta_list[i], meta)
    }
  }
 
 return(list(
   data = data,
   meta = meta
 ))
}

combining_all(my_list)

combining_all(list(data_daily, data_pa_daily, data_deq_daily))

daily_list <- mget(ls(pattern = "_daily"))
hourly_list <- mget(ls(pattern = "_hourly"))
diurnal_list <- mget(ls(pattern = "_diurnal"))
base_list <- mget(ls(pattern = "^(data_)((?!daily|hourly|diurnal).)*$"))
ls(pattern = "(?!daily)")
ls(pattern = "^data_deq")
grep("(?!daily)", ls(pattern = "^data_deq"))

list_all <- ls(pattern = "data_.+")
list_daily <- str_subset(list_all, "_daily")
list_diurnal <- str_subset(list_all, "_diurnal")
list_hourly <- str_subset(list_all, "_hourly")
```
